description: A number of European countries are enforcing new measures as cases continue to rise.
title: Covid-19: Austria and Portugal announce restrictions
title_page: Covid-19: Austria and Portugal announce restrictions - BBC News
maintext: Slovakia has announced it is testing everyone over the age of 10 to try and stop the spread of the disease there. The project to test four million people in the country, where infections have soared, is expected to last over two weekends.
